happy.q: Welcome every morning with a smile. Look on the new day as another gift from your Creator, another golden opportunity.
happy.h:
“Welcome every morning with a smile. Look on the new day as another gift from your Creator, another golden opportunity.” —
Og Mandino

happy.q: The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.
happy.h:
“The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.” —
James Allen

happy.q: Being spiritual has nothing to do with what you believe and everything to do with your state of consciousness.
happy.h:
“Being spiritual has nothing to do with what you believe and everything to do with your state of consciousness.” —
Eckhart Tolle

happy.q: Dreams provide nourishment for the soul, just as a meal does for the body.
happy.h:
“Dreams provide nourishment for the soul, just as a meal does for the body.” —
Paulo Coelho

happy.q: The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
happy.h:
“The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.” —
Tony Robbins

happy.q: Listening well is as powerful as talking well, and is also as essential to true conversation.
happy.h:
“Listening well is as powerful as talking well, and is also as essential to true conversation.” —
Chinese Proverb

happy.q: Exceptional thinkers ignore their critics and go about their business making history.
happy.h:
“Exceptional thinkers ignore their critics and go about their business making history.” —
John Eliot

happy.q: Thinking is a habit, and like any other habit, it can be changed; it just takes effort and repetition.
happy.h:
“Thinking is a habit, and like any other habit, it can be changed; it just takes effort and repetition.” —
John Eliot

happy.q: If you want to turn a vision into reality, you have to give 100% and never stop believing in your dream.
happy.h:
“If you want to turn a vision into reality, you have to give 100% and never stop believing in your dream.” —
Arnold Schwarzenegger

happy.q: The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.
happy.h:
“The more perfect a person is on the outside, the more demons they have on the inside.” —
Sigmund Freud

happy.q: The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice... it is conformity.
happy.h:
“The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice... it is conformity.” —
Earl Nightingale

happy.q: Sometimes you put walls up not to keep people out, but to see who cares enough to break them down.
happy.h:
“Sometimes you put walls up not to keep people out, but to see who cares enough to break them down.” —
Socrates

happy.q: The dead receive more flowers than the living because regret is stronger than gratitude.
happy.h:
“The dead receive more flowers than the living because regret is stronger than gratitude.” —
Anne Frank

happy.q: If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup.
happy.h:
“If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup.” —
Bruce Lee

happy.q: We must cultivate our garden.
happy.h:
“We must cultivate our garden. ” —
Voltaire

happy.q: We can choose to look at whatever we want.  We can look at what's wrong in our life or we can look at what's right.
happy.h:
“We can choose to look at whatever we want. We can look at what's wrong in our life or we can look at what's right.” —
Sonia Ricotti

happy.q: Every poem should remind the reader that they are going to die.
happy.h:
“Every poem should remind the reader that they are going to die.” —
Edgar Allan Poe

happy.q: Absurdity is the ecstasy of intellectualism.
happy.h:
“Absurdity is the ecstasy of intellectualism.” —
Criss Jami

happy.q: To himself everyone is immortal; he may know that he is going to die, but he can never know he is dead.
happy.h:
“To himself everyone is immortal; he may know that he is going to die, but he can never know he is dead.” —
Samuel Butler

happy.q: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.
happy.h:
“Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.” —
John Wooden

happy.q: No matter who you are, we're creatures of habit. The better your habits are, the better they will be in pressure situations.
happy.h:
“No matter who you are, we're creatures of habit. The better your habits are, the better they will be in pressure situations.” —
Wayne Gretzky

happy.q: Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.
happy.h:
“Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.” —
Miguel de Cervantes

happy.q: The strength of a wall is neither greater nor less than the courage of the men who defend it.
happy.h:
“The strength of a wall is neither greater nor less than the courage of the men who defend it. ” —
Genghis Khan

happy.q: Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem.
happy.h:
“Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem.” —
Woody Allen

happy.q: Everything you can imagine is real.
happy.h:
“Everything you can imagine is real.” —
Pablo Picasso

happy.q: A dream doesn't become reality through magic it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
happy.h:
“A dream doesn't become reality through magic it takes sweat, determination and hard work.” —
Colin Powell

happy.q: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
happy.h:
“Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.” —
Henry David Thoreau

happy.q: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
happy.h:
“Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.” —
Og Mandino

happy.q: Being wrong brings the opportunity for growth.
happy.h:
“Being wrong brings the opportunity for growth.” —
Mark Manson

happy.q: If you don't break your ropes while you're alive, do you think ghosts will do it after?
happy.h:
“If you don't break your ropes while you're alive, do you think ghosts will do it after?” —
Kabir

happy.q: You are not one person, but three: The one you think you are; The one others think you are; The one you really are.
happy.h:
“You are not one person, but three: The one you think you are; The one others think you are; The one you really are.” —
Sathya Sai Baba

happy.q: Our anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strengths.
happy.h:
“Our anxiety does not empty tomorrow of its sorrows, but only empties today of its strengths.” —
Charles Spurgeon

happy.q: Your mind will make you rich or poor, depending on the use you put to it.
happy.h:
“Your mind will make you rich or poor, depending on the use you put to it.” —
Brian Tracy

happy.q: You cannot push anyone up a ladder unless he is willing to climb a little himself.
happy.h:
“You cannot push anyone up a ladder unless he is willing to climb a little himself.” —
Andrew Carnegie

happy.q: Lack of emotion causes lack of progress and lack of motivation.
happy.h:
“Lack of emotion causes lack of progress and lack of motivation.” —
Tony Robbins

happy.q: The deeper the truth in a creative work, the longer it will live.
happy.h:
“The deeper the truth in a creative work, the longer it will live. ” —
Charlie Chaplin

happy.q: Reflect upon your present blessings of which every man has many - not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
happy.h:
“Reflect upon your present blessings of which every man has many - not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.” —
Charles Dickens

happy.q: A different result requires doing something different.
happy.h:
“A different result requires doing something different.” —
Gary Keller

happy.q: Manifest plainness, embrace simplicity, reduce selfishness, have few desires.
happy.h:
“Manifest plainness, embrace simplicity, reduce selfishness, have few desires.” —
Lao Tzu

happy.q: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
happy.h:
“Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.” —
Lolly Daskal

happy.q: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
happy.h:
“Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.” —
John Lennon

happy.q: If you set your goals ridiculously high and its a failure, you will fail above everyone elses success.
happy.h:
“If you set your goals ridiculously high and its a failure, you will fail above everyone elses success.” —
James Cameron

happy.q: If you do the work you get rewarded. There are no shortcuts in life.
happy.h:
“If you do the work you get rewarded. There are no shortcuts in life.” —
Michael Jordan

happy.q: The greatest work that kindness does to others is that it makes them kind themselves.
happy.h:
“The greatest work that kindness does to others is that it makes them kind themselves.” —
Amelia Earhart

happy.q: Every man's work, whether it be literature or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.
happy.h:
“Every man's work, whether it be literature or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.” —
Samuel Butler

happy.q: Do good by stealth, and blush to find it fame.
happy.h:
“Do good by stealth, and blush to find it fame.” —
Alexander Pope

happy.q: Respect was invented to cover the empty place where love should be.
happy.h:
“Respect was invented to cover the empty place where love should be.” —
Leo Tolstoy

happy.q: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
happy.h:
“Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.” —
Wayne Dyer

happy.q: The destiny of man is in his own soul.
happy.h:
“The destiny of man is in his own soul. ” —
Herodotus

happy.q: Love your enemies, for they tell you your faults.
happy.h:
“Love your enemies, for they tell you your faults.” —
Benjamin Franklin

anxiety.q: Anxiety does not define you; it is just a passing cloud in the vast sky of your mind.
anxiety.h:
“Anxiety does not define you; it is just a passing cloud in the vast sky of your mind.” —
Lila Rowan

anxiety.q: Just because you feel anxious does not mean something bad is going to happen.
anxiety.h:
“Just because you feel anxious does not mean something bad is going to happen.” —
James Calder

anxiety.q: One day, you will look back and realize that worrying was a waste of time.
anxiety.h:
“One day, you will look back and realize that worrying was a waste of time.” —
Nora Bennett

anxiety.q: You have survived 100% of your worst days. Keep going.
anxiety.h:
“You have survived 100% of your worst days. Keep going.” —
Elena Hart

anxiety.q: Your anxiety is lying to you. You are stronger than you think.
anxiety.h:
“Your anxiety is lying to you. You are stronger than you think.” —
Avery Lane

anxiety.q: Do not believe everything you think when you are anxious.
anxiety.h:
“Do not believe everything you think when you are anxious.” —
Caleb Monroe

anxiety.q: Breathe. It’s just a bad day, not a bad life.
anxiety.h:
“Breathe. It’s just a bad day, not a bad life.” —
Sophie Blair

anxiety.q: Your thoughts are not facts. They are just thoughts.
anxiety.h:
“Your thoughts are not facts. They are just thoughts.” —
Daniel Rhodes

anxiety.q: You are bigger than what you are anxious about.
anxiety.h:
“You are bigger than what you are anxious about.” —
Isla Cameron

anxiety.q: Let go of what you can't control and focus on what you can.
anxiety.h:
“Let go of what you can't control and focus on what you can.” —
Noah Pierce

anxiety.q: What if everything does work out?
anxiety.h:
“What if everything does work out?” —
Grace Wilder

anxiety.q: Trust the process, even if you don’t understand it now.
anxiety.h:
“Trust the process, even if you don’t understand it now.” —
Rowan Ellis

anxiety.q: Worrying does not take away tomorrow’s troubles. It takes away today’s peace.
anxiety.h:
“Worrying does not take away tomorrow’s troubles. It takes away today’s peace.” —
Mila Thornton

anxiety.q: Give yourself the same kindness you give to others.
anxiety.h:
“Give yourself the same kindness you give to others.” —
Henry Cross

uplifting.q: Tears are words the heart can't express.
uplifting.h:
“Tears are words the heart can't express.” —
Amelia Cross

uplifting.q: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
uplifting.h:
“Sadness flies away on the wings of time.” —
Jean de La Fontaine

uplifting.q: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
uplifting.h:
“Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.” —
Victor Hugo

uplifting.q: Your present circumstances don’t determine where you go; they merely determine where you start.
uplifting.h:
“Your present circumstances don’t determine where you go; they merely determine where you start.” —
Nido Qubein

uplifting.q: There is no light without darkness, and no joy without sorrow.
uplifting.h:
“There is no light without darkness, and no joy without sorrow.” —
Miles Whitman

uplifting.q: Crying is how your heart speaks when your lips can’t explain the pain you feel.
uplifting.h:
“Crying is how your heart speaks when your lips can’t explain the pain you feel.” —
Isabelle Frost

uplifting.q: Grief, no matter how you try to cater to its wail, has a way of fading away.
uplifting.h:
“Grief, no matter how you try to cater to its wail, has a way of fading away.” —
V.C. Andrews

uplifting.q: The way sadness works is one day you wake up and you no longer cry for what you lost.
uplifting.h:
“The way sadness works is one day you wake up and you no longer cry for what you lost.” —
Jasper Hale

uplifting.q: Sadness does not last forever when we walk in the direction of what we always desired.
uplifting.h:
“Sadness does not last forever when we walk in the direction of what we always desired.” —
Paulo Coelho

uplifting.q: It's okay to be sad sometimes. It means that you cared.
uplifting.h:
“It's okay to be sad sometimes. It means that you cared.” —
Nina Harrow

uplifting.q: Stars can’t shine without darkness.
uplifting.h:
“Stars can’t shine without darkness.” —
Ezra Lennox

uplifting.q: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
uplifting.h:
“Turn your wounds into wisdom.” —
Oprah Winfrey

uplifting.q: Do not be afraid of sadness, for it is the path to healing.
uplifting.h:
“Do not be afraid of sadness, for it is the path to healing.” —
Ivy Renner

uplifting.q: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
uplifting.h:
“Tough times never last, but tough people do.” —
Robert H. Schuller

uplifting.q: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.
uplifting.h:
“The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.” —
Leo Whitaker

uplifting.q: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.
uplifting.h:
“Sadness is but a wall between two gardens.” —
Kahlil Gibran

uplifting.q: Sometimes, we just need to let the sadness wash over us like a wave.
uplifting.h:
“Sometimes, we just need to let the sadness wash over us like a wave.” —
Marla Quinn

uplifting.q: Healing takes time, and that’s okay.
uplifting.h:
“Healing takes time, and that’s okay.” —
Jude Fallon

uplifting.q: Rain makes everything grow, even you.
uplifting.h:
“Rain makes everything grow, even you.” —
Willa Hayes

uplifting.q: The pain will pass. Keep holding on.
uplifting.h:
“The pain will pass. Keep holding on.” —
Reed Holloway

uplifting.q: No storm lasts forever; the sun will shine again.
uplifting.h:
“No storm lasts forever; the sun will shine again.” —
Tessa Monroe

uplifting.q: Tears cleanse the soul. Let them fall when needed.
uplifting.h:
“Tears cleanse the soul. Let them fall when needed.” —
Loren Beck

uplifting.q: Your sadness does not define you.
uplifting.h:
“Your sadness does not define you.” —
Mae Whitfield

uplifting.q: Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.
uplifting.h:
“Every day may not be good, but there is something good in every day.” —
Alice Morse Earle
